src_original: tyāga idānīṃ vaktavyaḥ /  tatra tāvat [222/19-222/20]  prātimokṣadamatyāgaḥ śikṣānikṣepaṇāccyuteḥ /  ubhayavyañjanotpattermūlacchedānniśātyayāt // VAkK_4.38 // [222/21]
śikṣāpadānāṃ vijñapuruṣasyāntike pratyākhyānadāśayataḥ nikāyasabhāgatyāgāt yugapadu bhayavyañjanaprādurbhāvāt kuśalamūlasamucchedācca / [222/24]
